content.text:
Let me analyze the images and provide a detailed solution:

Target Image Analysis:
- The structure consists of two separate block configurations
- Colors used: Red, Yellow, Green, Orange
- Both structures have multiple layers and use cylindrical/rectangular blocks
- First structure (left) has 4 layers, second structure (right) has 3 layers

Block Dictionary Analysis:
- Contains 16 different block configurations
- Colors: Red, Green, Yellow, Orange
- Various shapes: Cylindrical, Rectangular, Triangular, Curved segments

Block Selection for First Structure (Left):
- Bottom Layer: Red curved block (index 1)
- Second Layer: Yellow rectangular block (index 10)
- Third Layer: Two Orange cylindrical blocks (index 12)
- Top Layer: Orange triangular block (index 16)

Block Selection for Second Structure (Right):
- Bottom Layer: Green rectangular block (index 8)
- Second Layer: Yellow rectangular block (index 10)
- Top Layer: Orange triangular block (index 16)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 10
    Step3: Move block with index 12 (twice)
    Step4: Move block with index 16
    Step5: Move block with index 8
    Step6: Move block with index 10
    Step7: Move block with index 16
}
